synopsis.text: Neko-sensei, a peculiar character with the ability to transform into a colossal motorcycle, escorts the Astronomy Club on an extraordinary adventure to a renowned animation studio. Here, the club members stumble upon an unsettling revelation: they are merely characters in an anime called Ebiten. Dismayed by this discovery, they decide to delve deeper into the 'real' world, encountering animators, editors, and even their own voice actresses along the way. As they navigate through this uncharted territory, the girls must grapple with the reality of meeting their creators and unravel the mystery behind their existence in this fictional universe.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
